answers.answer: Hi,You have what is termed as irritative urinary symptoms as presented by increase in urinary frequency and pain in urination. Pain at the end of urination may suggest a lower  urinary tract infection. This may be a case of cystitis.Just a few questions:Have you had bouts of urinary tract infections before?As this is relevant to your case, is there a significant sexual history?Any other underlying systemic problems like diabetes?
I have never had a UTI before, nor anything like it before.  I am having sex with one person whom I have been for 7 months now.  No diabetes history either...

hi. I am having similar problems. at first it only occured when I was running. then I often had to pee. but now for the past years it happens to me in spite I´m not moving, I often pee every half hour and it is only a small amount. This is very frustrating because I can´t exercise without having the urge to pee. I have gone to see two doctors but nothing has made it better. I´ve taken pills, gone in surgery and tried to change my diet.. It doesn´t always hurt when I pee but it hurts sometimes. And after sex it sometimes hurts a lot.

hi, ive also had these symptoms of pain and so forth, but i usually feel like i have to go to the washroom when im on the bus or just working out at the gym etc and when i get off i feel fine and i can hold it in, on the bus etc it feels like there would be no way of holding it, its been going on for a while its really frustrating me, ive gone to the doctors everything seems to be fine, and nothing seems to be wrong but i feel as if i have to go all the time and nothing happens until i forget about it or my mind is busy with something else, but as soon as i get the urge i have to go, its really messing things up, and im tired of it also,any suggestions.

question: I have recently had the urge to pee frequently.  It doesn't sting or anything but when I am done peeing, I get a little pain that feels like it is up in my bladder.  I feel the urge to pee about every half hour or so and when I do, it is only a small amount.  Please help!
title: Urge to Pee
